mapper.update: update relation set status=#{a} where user_id=#{uid} and friend_user_id=#{fid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM relation WHERE status = 0 AND insert_time <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY);
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE (send_user_account = #{sendUserAccount} AND accept_user_account = #{acceptUserAccount}) OR (send_user_account = #{acceptUserAccount} AND accept_user_account = #{sendUserAccount}) ORDER BY send_time DESC LIMIT 500 ) AS recent_messages ORDER BY send_time ASC;
